description: Up in the attic, four secrets are hidden. Four blonde, beautiful, innocent little secrets, struggling to stay alive. Chris, Cathy, Cory and Carrie have perfect lives - until a tragic accident changes everything. Now they must wait, hidden from view in their grandparents' attic, as their mother tries to figure out what to do next.
name: Flowers in the Attic
category: Categories Crime Fiction, Teenage Fiction 12 to 15 Years
